description: Lead frontend development for a team of 5 developers, architecting scalable React applications serving 100k+ daily active users. Implemented design systems and improved page load times by 40%.
Built and maintained full-stack applications using React and Node.js. Collaborated closely with designers and product managers to deliver pixel-perfect user experiences.
Developed responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Gained experience in modern web technologies and agile development practices.
